properties.Name: CustomerStatus
properties.Description: The status of the associated customer for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp associated with the information.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp associated with the information.

Columns.Name: CustomerStatusNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Status.

Columns.Name: CustomerStatusTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Status Type.
